√kam 'love'

perfect: cakamé etc. V.+  

aorist: [3.] acakamata  acīkamata etc.   -- [5.] kamiṣīṣṭa  

future: [1.] kamiṣyate etc.   -- [2.] kamitā  

verbal: kāṃta E.+  kāṃtvā  kamitvā  -kamas  -kā́mam  

secondary: caṅkam-   -- desiderative: cikamiṣa-   -- causative: kāmáyate etc. V.+  kāmáyati etc.  

derivatives: kám? V.+  kama-? V.  kamana C.  kamanīya C.  kamitṛ C.  kamra C.  kā́ma V.+  kāmín V.+  kā́mya V.+  -kāmyā́ AV.+  -kāman RV1.  kāmana S.+  kā́muka B.+  kāṃti E.+  kāmyitavya C.  

Doubtless the same with the preceding.
